mapper.select: SELECT question.id, question.title, question.content, question.created_by, question.created_at, tag.name AS tname FROM question JOIN question_tag ON question.id = question_tag.question_id JOIN tag ON question_tag.tag_id = tag.id WHERE question.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT question.id) FROM question JOIN question_tag ON question.id = question_tag.question_id JOIN tag ON question_tag.tag_id = tag.id
WHERE tag.name = #{tagName}
